attributes.action: We, the people of Breat Britain, would like to see The Twang support The Stone Roses at Heaton Park in June 2012.
attributes.additional_details: We, the music loving people of Great Britian, are campaigning to make it a legal requirement that well known Brummie guitar band, The Twang, are installed as The Stone Roses support band during their 2012 world tour, particularly being in attendance on Saturday 30th June 2012 when Chris Bennett and friends will be in attendance.
